price: Or did We create the angels as females while they were watching?
arabic: أَمۡ خَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةَ إِنَٰثٗا وَهُمۡ شَٰهِدُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
